title: Respond to a State Nexus Questionnaire
description: A business receives a questionnaire from a state's Department of Revenue asking about its activities in the state to determine if it has tax nexus.

tasks.description: Review the questionnaire to understand the specific information the state is seeking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the scope of the state's inquiry.

tasks.description: Gather data on the company's activities in that state (e.g., sales, property, payroll, employee travel).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete record of the company's connections to the state.

tasks.description: Complete the questionnaire accurately and strategically to present the company's position.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides truthful answers while avoiding unnecessary disclosures.
